column1: restore_roman_empire_HRE_desc;If Constantinople and the other key territories of the Easten empire could be conquered
column2: [e_hre.GetName] would be recognized as the true and rightful continuation of the Roman State.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_roman_empire_LAT_desc;If Rome and the other key territories of the Westen empire could be conquered
column2: [e_latin_empire.GetName] would be recognized as what's left of true and rightful continuation of the Roman State.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_roman_empire_ITA_desc;If Constantinople and the other key territories of the Easten empire could be conquered
column2: [e_italy.GetName] would be recognized as the true and rightful continuation of the Roman State.;;;;;;;;;x
